tasks.title: Refactor macro endpoint create/update signatures to reduce argument count
Refactor saved search update endpoint to reduce argument count
Apply ConfigFilesLoaded/ConfigStanzasLoaded results to TUI state
Route macro load/create/update/delete results through App::update
Implement create-macro dialog flow in TUI
Implement edit-macro dialog flow in TUI
Trigger macro list refresh after create/update
Add make type-check target and include it in make ci
Align make clean behavior with documented Cargo.lock deletion
Add real-time search support to TUI and CLI
Add search result pagination and cursor support
Add audit logging and event viewing
Add dashboard listing and viewing
Add data model management
Add workload management support
Add search head clustering (SHC) support
Default profile credentials storage to keyring (opt-in plaintext)
Prevent overwriting unreadable config files (backup + fail-safe recovery)
Fix `SKIP_LIVE_TESTS=1` to actually skip live tests
Make `make lint` fail when clippy -D warnings would fail (don't rely on `cargo clippy --fix` exit code)
Fix TUI list pagination: LoadMore actions no-op/replace data instead of appending
Avoid blocking the TUI event loop in side effects (spawn network calls consistently)
Refactor SplunkClient search APIs to avoid too-many-arguments and clarify options
Remove dummy Config construction in `splunk-cli list-all` dispatch (make illegal states unrepresentable)
Validate `base_url` during config build (fail fast with clear error)
Trim env var values in `env_var_or_none` to match documented invariants
Surface dotenv load failures (don't silently ignore invalid `.env` files)
Remove duplicate timeout flags in `splunk-cli config set` help output
List contents of current directory
Audit and fix TUI glitches, visual bugs, and input handling edge cases
Implement TUI UX polish: consistent feedback, loading states, and flow optimization
Implement rich input components: tui-input and tui-textarea for enhanced text editing
Implement syntax highlighting with tree-sitter and flexbox layout with taffy
Create centralized TUI foundation files and ensure universal adoption
Integrate tui-scrollview crate and enhance focus management system
Implement advanced TUI components: diff viewer, big text, animations, and markdown
End-to-end TUI robustness validation and stress testing
Redact search query from TUI debug logs
Make TUI help popup section ordering a single source of truth
Add a dedicated Macros keybinding section and map Macros screen correctly
Align Macros help/keybinding catalog with actual Macros shortcuts
Document the conditional 'e' Error Details shortcut in the keybinding catalog
Sync search pagination page size with configured SearchDefaults.max_results
Add drift-prevention test: footer hint priority keys must exist in keymap catalog
Deduplicate overview resource fetchers shared by Overview and Multi-Instance screens
Replace overview/multi-instance magic timeouts and list limits with shared constants
Sanitize persisted SearchDefaults invariants on load (max_results >= 1, non-empty times)
Cache footer_hints to avoid per-frame keybinding catalog allocations
Fail HEC send on unparseable response instead of returning Success
Implement SPLUNK_INTERNAL_LOGS_* env overrides (or remove docs claiming them)
Preserve focus when removing earlier component in FocusManager
Make FlexLayoutBuilder::column/row fallible instead of panicking
